{% set taxes_and_charge = {} %} {% set tax = 0.0 %} {% set total_tax = 0.0 %} {%- for row in doc.other_charges -%} {% if row.account_head == '2-4100 GST Net Liability - D' -%} {% set tax = tax + (row.tax_amount or 0.0)%} {% set t = taxes_and_charge.update({'GST':tax}) %} {% else %} {% set t = taxes_and_charge.update({row.description:row.tax_amount}) %} {% set total_tax = total_tax + row.tax_amount %} {% set t = taxes_and_charge.update({'total_tax':total_tax}) %} {% endif %} {% set included_tax = 0.0 %} {% if row.included_in_print_rate -%} {% set included_tax = included_tax + (row.tax_amount or 0.0)%} {% set t = taxes_and_charge.update({'included_tax':included_tax}) %} {% endif %} {% if not row.included_in_print_rate and row.account_head == '2-4100 GST Net Liability - D'-%} {% set tx = totals.get("gst") + row.tax_amount %} {% set t = totals.update({"gst":tx}) %} {% endif %} {%- endfor -%} {% set t = taxes_and_charge.update({'included_tax':totals.get("gst")}) %} {% set total_tax = (taxes_and_charge.get("total_tax") or 0.0) + totals.get("gst") %} {% set t = taxes_and_charge.update({'total_tax':total_tax}) %} {%- for label,amt in taxes_and_charge|dictsort -%} {% if label != 'included_tax' and label != 'total_tax' %} {% endif %} {%- endfor -%}
